body_content.explanation: a talk giving information about something:
examples: The speaker gave an interesting presentation on urban transport.

body_content.explanation: an occasion when prizes, qualifications, etc. are formally given to those who have won or achieved them:
examples: The presentation of prizes and certificates will take place in the main hall.

body_content.explanation: the way something looks when it is shown to other people, or the way someone looks:
examples: Presentation is important if you want people to buy your products.
